GA4 Annotations+ is a web app that allows users to annotate their Google Analytics 4 (GA4) data more intuitively and powerfully within the GA4 UI dashboards. 

With GA4 Annotations Plus, users can easily add notes, comments, and tags to their GA4 data while collaborating with cross-teams, making it easier to understand and track traffic performance.
